subject: Education (K-12)
Charter Schools
Football
lead_paragraph: The board of a Texas charter school co-founded by the Hall of Famer Deion Sanders is set to vote Monday on whether to surrender its charter, The Dallas Morning News reported.
snippet: The board of a Texas charter school co-founded by the Hall of Famer Deion Sanders is set to vote Monday on whether to surrender its charter, The Dallas Morning News reported.
